a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average years of schooling vs. GDP per capita, 1990 to 2025
The average years of schooling completed by individuals aged 25 and older. GDP per capita is adjusted for
inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
Average annual change in GDP per capita
Average annual change in average years of schooling
Data source: Barro and Lee (2015); Lee and Lee (2016); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank (2025)
Note: Formal education is primary/ISCED 1 or higher. This does not include years spent repeating grades. Data for the average years of

schooling for years before 2015 are estimates, while data from 2015 onwards are projections. GDP per capita is expressed in
international-$
